CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.2.i.6b, reactiondurationunit (3N)
E2B (R3): E.i.6b Duration of Reaction / Event (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if E.i.6a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.26 Value Allowed: Constrained UCUM codes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element captures the unit of time for the value recorded.
CustomField.label: Duration Unit
